name: Storage War
description:
In this game you will have to fight against the time and the lack of space in order to have the biggest storage

KEYBOARD INPUT

 AZERTY
      - Z: Forward
      - Q: Left
      - S: Backward
      - D: Right
      - Shift: Run
      - Space: Jump
      - Escape: Pause

 QWERTY
      - W: Forward
      - A: Left
      - S: Backward
      - D: Right
      - Shift: Run
      - Space: Jump
      - Escape: Pause
